column4: Hello All.  Stupid Question - I cannot seem to get a good .DEB package for AIM on the AOL sight.  I have a TGZ file.  Can I install this as root and get the files where they need to be?  Will tar -xvf <filename> work?
you know you have gaim right?
gaim definitely seems to have all the options that version of gaim has, is there anything in particular he dislikes?
